attributes.action: Keep certain year groups off from school to lower the COVID-19 cases.
attributes.background: If certain year groups are off and doing remote learning, those who are studying for GCSE and A Level can receive face to face learning. This will help exams to go forward and not be cancelled in 2022.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure who you'd like to be required to undertake home learning and who should attend school. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
